snippet: Behind all the sports and smiles is an urgent human rights mission.
abstract: Lawrence Downes Editorial Observer praises good will and inclusion on display in Special Olympics, but contends competitions masks fact that people with intellectual disabilities still face discrimination and lack of resources in daily life; acknowledges efforts of organizers to address serious issue of rights for disabled people, while putting on feel-good face.
lead_paragraph: Behind all the sports and smiles is an urgent human rights mission.
